meanings.definition: To make something known to the public through advertisements.
meanings.sent1: The company decided to advertize their new product on TV.
meanings.sent2: Businesses often advertize their services in newspapers.
meanings.sent3: I heard a joke about a cat trying to advertize its meowing skills.
meanings.sent4: Her smile advertized her happiness to the world.
meanings.sent5: The bright neon sign advertized the upcoming sale with flashing lights.

meanings.definition: To promote or sell a product or service through advertising.
meanings.sent1: The store will advertize their special discounts next week.
meanings.sent2: Companies often advertize their products on social media platforms.
meanings.sent3: The penguin tried to advertize its ice-skating lessons to the other animals.
meanings.sent4: His confident tone advertized his expertise in the subject.
meanings.sent5: The colorful banner advertized the grand opening of the new restaurant.
